entry.title: https://github.com/emcie-co/parlant

entry.title: https://github.com/jdepoix/youtube-transcript-api
entry.content: This is a python API which allows you to get the transcript/subtitles for a given YouTube video. It also works for automatically generated subtitles and it does not require an API key nor a headless browser, like other selenium based solutions do!
